Description:
Detects adding and using Exchange PowerShell snap-ins to export mailbox data. As seen used by HAFNIUM and APT27

Author: FPT.EagleEye, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Exchange PowerShell Snap-Ins Usage
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((((process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe') and (original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll')) and command like '%add-pssnapin%' and (command like '%microsoft.exchange.powershell.snapin%' or command like '%microsoft.exchange.management.powershell.snapin%')) and  not (parent_process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\msiexec.exe' and command like '%$exserver=get-exchangeserver ([environment]::machinename) -errorvariable exerr 2> $null%'))
